author: Special Correspondent
text: Fourteen Youth Congress members were arrested here on Wednesday after they attempted to burn an effigy of BJP MLA of Rajasthan Kailash Chaudhary for his purported remarks against Congress vice president Rahul Gandhi. A group of Youth Congress members led by the party’s Tiruchi Parliamentary constituency Youth Congress president Allur Suresh assembled near the Arunachala Mandram — the Congress district unit office — and attempted to burn an effigy of Kailash Chaudhary to express their condemnation against the alleged comments made by the Rajasthan MLA against Rahul Gandhi. The police foiled the bid to burn the effigy and arrested the Congress members assembled at the spot, sources said.
title: Congress members arrested over bid to burn BJP MLA effigy
